name: part_000
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Dec 19, 2021)【3DLIVE】メルキス3周年LIVE♡Xmas Party【#メルキス３周年ライブ】 [6J010KA__RQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening graphics and countdown for MelKiss 3rd Anniversary Live.
Performance of 'Suki! Yuki! Maji Magic' by Yozora Mel and Aki Rosenthal.

subtitles.original: 甘い　デコレーションケーキのような　街は　スキ・ユキ・マジ・マジック
subtitles.english: A city like a sweet decorated cake is Suki-Yuki-Maji-Magic

subtitles.original: 空が　くれる　コンフェッティは　冬のフェスタ祝う　天使の羽よ
subtitles.english: The confetti falling from the sky are angel wings celebrating the winter festival

subtitles.original: 白銀の国へ　出かけるの　GO! GO! GO!
subtitles.english: Heading to the silver country. GO! GO! GO!

subtitles.original: 雪の汽車が　街を駆け　CHOO! CHOO! CHOO!
subtitles.english: The snow train runs through the town. CHOO! CHOO! CHOO!

subtitles.original: 絵本みたいな景色を　君に見せてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll show you a scenery like a picture book

subtitles.original: 願い込めて呪文　さぁ　唱えて
subtitles.english: Make a wish and chant the spell

subtitles.original: One, two, three!
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original: A B C D ドレミファソラシ　マジカル　ミラクル　クル・ポッ！
subtitles.english: A B C D Do-Re-Mi-Fa-Sol-La-Si, Magical Miracle, Kuru-Po!

subtitles.original: 甘い　デコレーションケーキのような　街は　スキ・ユキ・マジ・マジック
subtitles.english: A city like a sweet decorated cake is Suki-Yuki-Maji-Magic

subtitles.original: 空が　くれる　コンフェッティは　冬のフェスタ祝う　天使の羽よ
subtitles.english: The confetti falling from the sky are angel wings celebrating the winter festival

subtitles.original: ライトアップした　オーロラ色の街は　スキ・ユキ・マジ・マジック
subtitles.english: The illuminated aurora-colored city is Suki-Yuki-Maji-Magic

subtitles.original: 子供でいられたら　Three, two, one!
subtitles.english: If only we could stay as children, Three, two, one!

subtitles.original: Ladies and Gentlemen, Welcome to MelKiss!
subtitles.english: Ladies and Gentlemen, Welcome to MelKiss!

subtitles.original: ツンと　冷たい　季節も　好きになれるわ
subtitles.english: I can even learn to love the biting cold season

subtitles.original: アイスの魔法　解けないように　ヒュー・ヒュー・ヒュー
subtitles.english: So the ice magic doesn't melt, Hew-Hew-Hew

subtitles.original: ずっと　このままじゃダメなの　やっぱり　ドキドキしたいな
subtitles.english: I can't stay like this forever, after all, I want my heart to race

subtitles.original: 未来　求め呪文　さぁ　唱えて
subtitles.english: Seeking the future, chant the spell

subtitles.original: One, two, three!
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original: 一二三四　水金地火木　マジカル　ミラクル　クル・ポッ！
subtitles.english: 1 2 3 4, Mercury Venus Earth Mars Jupiter, Magical Miracle, Kuru-Po!

subtitles.original: ホップした　ウサギのような気分　スキ・ユキ・マジ・マジック
subtitles.english: Feeling like a hopping rabbit, Suki-Yuki-Maji-Magic

subtitles.original: 大地が　くれる　キャンディ食べたら　思い通り遊んでいけるよ
subtitles.english: If I eat the candy the earth gives me, I can play as I wish

subtitles.original: 眩しい　白に染まる　ハート　君に　スキ・ユキ・マジ・マジック
subtitles.english: A heart dyed in dazzling white, to you, Suki-Yuki-Maji-Magic

subtitles.original: 大人のふりなんて　いいじゃん
subtitles.english: Who cares about pretending to be an adult?

subtitles.original: I hear the bell now, winter is coming! This is my world,
subtitles.english: I hear the bell now, winter is coming! This is my world,

subtitles.original: are you ready? Nanana fantastic! Snow cake magical!
subtitles.english: are you ready? Nanana fantastic! Snow cake magical!

subtitles.original: Smile flavor magical! I see you feel my love, oh oh oh oh!
subtitles.english: Smile flavor magical! I see you feel my love, oh oh oh oh!

subtitles.original: 今日の　寒さも　忘れるように
subtitles.english: So we can forget today's cold

subtitles.original: 悩みだって　悩みだって　凍らせて　消せる　魔力よ
subtitles.english: It's a magic power that can freeze and erase even worries, even worries

subtitles.original: A B C D ドレミファソラシ　マジカル　ミラクル　クル・ポッ！
subtitles.english: A B C D Do-Re-Mi-Fa-Sol-La-Si, Magical Miracle, Kuru-Po!

subtitles.original: 甘い　デコレーションケーキのような　街は　スキ・ユキ・マジ・マジック
subtitles.english: A city like a sweet decorated cake is Suki-Yuki-Maji-Magic
